author: Special Correspondent
text:
GENERAL

Codissia – SIDBI Industrial Services: Counselling and Guidance to entrepreneurs, Codissia Conference hall, 3 p.m.

Hindusthan Institute of Technology: National Level Technical Symposium, Seminar Hall, 9 a.m.

Sankara Educational Institutions: Campaign on “Pledge to Vote”, Fun Republic Mall, 11 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Campus placement pool drive – “The Royal Bank of Scotland”, Auditorium, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: National conference on “Innovations in Communication and Computing”, Seminar hall, 10:30 a.m.

Avinashilingam University: Research convention, 9:45 a.m.; National Conference on “Internet of Things”, Seminar hall, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Productivity Council: Programme on “First Aid”, 9 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: National level Workshop on “Matlab”, 9 a.m.

PSG Institute of Medical Sciences & Research: Conference on “Academic Emergency Medicine”, Auditorium, 12 p.m.

Sri Venkateswara Group of Institutions: National level Management Meet, 8:30 a.m.

Confederation of Indian Industry: National Conference on “Pumps”, The Residency Towers, 9 a.m.

Shri Nehru Maha Vidyalaya: College day celebrations, 9:30 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Conference on “Advancement in Electrical Sciences”, Seminar hall, 9:45 a.m.

Kalaivani College of Technology: Summit on “Student Empowerment & Entrepreneurship Development”, 10 a.m.

Sasi College of Architecture and Business: Cultural School Fest, 9 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: Celebrating 30 years of Excellence of DBT, GRD Auditorium, 2 p.m.

Rathinam College of Arts and Science: Seminar, MBA Hall, 10 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Guest lecture on “Compiler Design”, 10 a.m.

Rukmani Kannan Vidyalaya Matriculation Hr. Sec. School: School day function, 5 p.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Workshop on “Business Analysis in Entrepreneurial Ventures”, Seminar Hall, 10 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering: Inauguration of R &D department, 10 a.m.

PALLADAM

Professional Group of Institutions: Techno-Cultural event for UG students, 9 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
